0: The hotel is going through a renovation so the restaurant is closed and the parking garage is closed
Even with renovations going on which I did not even notice but which they made sure you were aware of offered amenities for I would suggest staying here it is only getting better
This is an older hotel in the process of exterior renovations
Some things need to be updated but everything was clean and comfortable
Rooms and bedding were good but the hotel seems to be aging poorly and could use a refresh
I was told by hotel staff that they were planning a renovation in 2years and in the interim planned to do some deep carpet cleaning
For example minor maintenance issue not affecting my stay in any way I mentioned for a heads up was resolved by lunch
In my opinion the hallways and rooms smelled musty with alot of carpet stains and the rooms were in desperate need of refurbishment
Overpriced In dire need of updating terrible service
1: Although the hotel is undergoing major renovation they did their best to make our stay as comfortable as possible
Room was newly renovated and very nice had a coffee shop in the hotel
Updated hotel clean and walking distance to power and light
I greatly appreciated the updated decor both in the main lobby and private rooms
The assistant manager checked us in notifying us of the remodeling currently underway
Completely updated beautiful rooms and The Suite awesome idea for a smaller meeting space
I definitely liked it alot better this time around new room renovations and the lobby had snacks drinks you could buy
A nice older hotel that has been updated
Room was clean updated and very comfortable
